info.title: Simple TextBlob API
info.description: API that accepts a text string and uses the TextBlob python library to analyze it. Various endpoints return part-of-speech taggs, sentiment scores, spellchecked words, and translations of the input into other languages.

post.description: Return the part-of-speech tags for the input text

requestBody.description: Json with single field containing text to tag

200.description: Returns list of each word and its tag

post.description: Calculates the sentiment polarity score for the input text

requestBody.description: Json with single field containing text to analyze for sentiment

200.description: Returns a single number representing sentiment polarity

post.description: Attempts to auto-correct any spelling mistakes in the text

requestBody.description: Json with single field containing text to correct spelling

200.description: Returns best attempt at spelling-corrected text

post.description: Translate input text into a different language (language codes: https://cloud.google.com/translate/docs/languages)

parameters.name: toLang
parameters.description: Two-letter language code to translate to

requestBody.description: Json with single field containing text to translate
